minor.name: Minor in Professional Writing
minor.version: EY2024 Doha Minor in Professional Writing
minor.Description: The Professional Writing Minor consists of 6 courses. Students must also take the First-Year Writing experience as a prerequisite.
minor.Notes: Students need to take at most 6 courses worth 54 units in total. Student shave to take either of the two pre-requisite paths. In path one they have to only take one of the two offered courses, while in the second path, students have to take two courses out of three offered. In professional writing requirement, students only need to take 1 course in total. Students need to take two courses in total from the combination of 76-2xx or 76-3xx. Same exact case with 76-300 or 76-400 level course. In the end, one last 76-2xx or above elective should be taken to complete all 6 courses.

program_requirements.requirement: Fulfill all of the following requirements

double_counting_rules.description: Up to 1 course may double count with other programs unless specified otherwise
cannot_double_count_with_programs: BA in Film and Visual Media
Additional Major in Film and Visual Media
Additional Major in Literature and Culture

writing_for_professions_or_intro.requirement: Fulfill any of the following requirements
writing_for_professions_or_intro.description: Writing for the Professions OR Introduction to Professional and Technical Writing

options.title: Introduction to Professional and Technical Writing

two_200_or_300_level_core_writing_course.requirement: Take at least 1 course and at least 18 units total

max_units_from_creative_writing.description: Take at most 9 units from these creative writing courses
